attributes.action: all key workers in food retail to be entitled  to covid vaccine immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
In food retail  we have worked  through  covid  national  lock down  and second lock down.  We are at so much risk every day with the amount of public  that come into  our supermarkets. It is only fair to recognise  that  we all worked  and not through  choice . My colleagues  came to work frightened  and terrified  of catching  covid 19 yet they worked and we kept the community  supplied with food  essentials.  
We still are working  face to face with hundreds of customers .
attributes.background: Consider  giving all food retail  key workers  vaccine  as priority  alongside  care homes and medical  nurse doctors  .
